name: Sidebar Coffee
address: Address: 401 Red River Road (Inside Bora Laskin Faculty of Law)
text:
THE SIDEBAR MENU

BEVERAGES
HOT CHOCOLATE (12 OZ) - $2.50
HOT APPLE CIDER (12 OZ) - $2.50
FLAVOUR SHOTS (1/2 OZ) - $0.50
COFFEE (12 OZ) - $1.80
TEA (12 OZ) - $1.80

BREAKFAST
EGG & CHEESE ENGLISH MUFFIN - $4.50
BACON, EGG & CHEESE ENGLISH MUFFIN - $5.50
BAGEL - $3.00 Everything bagel (ADD cream cheese for $1.00)
MUFFINS - $2.50 chocolate chip, coffee cake
COOKIES - $1.50 M&M chocolate chip
CINNAMON BUNS - $4.00

LUNCH ITALIAN SUB - $8.50 Salami, pepperoni, provolone cheese, pickled peppers, pesto aioli, on a pressed bun
HAM & SWISS CROISSANT - $8.50 Black forest ham, swiss cheese, lettuce, red onion and honey dijon spread on a croissant
ROASTED VEGGIE & HERBED FETA WRAP - $7.50 Fire-roasted bell peppers, zucchini, onions, lettuce, herbed feta cheese, and balsamic rosemary aioli in a flour tortilla
WEEKLY SALAD - $7.50 A new chef creation each week
CHIPS & SALSA - $5.50 Seasoned corn chips with a mild salsa
PITAS AND HUMMUS - $5.50 Crunchy seasoned pitas with roasted garlic hummus dip
